#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int
#define si(a) scanf("%d", &a)
#define sl(a) scanf("%lld", &a)
#define sc(a) scanf("%c", &a)
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define SET(x, a) memset(x, a, sizeof(x))

using namespace std;

int dp[305][305];

int cricHeight(int n, int m)
{
	if (dp[n][m] > -1) {
		return dp[n][m];
	};

	if (n == 1) return m;

	if (m == 0 || m == 1) {
		return m;
	}
	int mn = INT_MAX;
	for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {
		int x = max(cricHeight(n - 1, i -1), cricHeight(n, m - i));
		if (x < mn) {
			mn = x;
		}
	}
	dp[n][m] = mn + 1;
	return dp[n][m];
}

int main()
{	
	SET(dp, -1);
	int t, n, m;
	si(t);
	while (t--) {
		si(m);si(n);
		printf("%d\n", cricHeight(n, m) + n);
	}
	return 0;
}
